showSmallest

public void showSmallest()
                  throws java.io.IOException
showSmallest searches the distance matrix for the smallest entry. After finding the location of the smallest entry it calls makeAncestor and passes in the location. Following makeAncestor a call to newDistanceMatrix is made with the location of the smallest entry.

Throws:
java.io.IOException

makeAncestor

public void makeAncestor(int x,
                         int y)
                  throws java.io.IOException
Passed location of smallest entry in the distance matrix. Creates a new node for the ancestor. New node is placed in the position of the smaller between x and y.

Parameters:
x - row of smallest entry
y - column of smallest entry
Throws:
java.io.IOException

newDistanceMatrix

public void newDistanceMatrix(int row,
                              int col)
                       throws java.io.IOException
Creates a new GAIGSarray and fills it with values from the old matrix. After creating the next distance matrix the old matrix is set equal to the new matrix.

Parameters:
row -
col -
Throws:
java.io.IOException - - Takes snap and can throw an exception.
